rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0001
rows.name: I am Nagi Kentarou, commander of NLA's defense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Many of you here were my subordinates back on the White Whale.
You likely know I'm not good at lying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0003
rows.name: So, I will tell you only the facts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0004
rows.name: This is a state of emergency.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
In addition to Doll-class ground combat weapons,
large, unidentified flying weapons have also been observed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
We know they possess Doll-class ground-based units,
and we have reports of unidentified flying weaponry as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0007
rows.name: They show no sign of responding to our requests for negotiation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0008
rows.name: Director General Maurice is continuing efforts towards dialogue, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0009
rows.name: As for me, I must proceed with preparations for armed defense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0010
rows.name: That is why I have gathered all BLADE Unions here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Searching for and securing the Lifepoint
is our top priority mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0012
rows.name: However, NLA is now not just for us humans,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0013
rows.name: It has become the foundation of life for the Ma-non here and many other alien peoples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0014
rows.name:
And for the sake of the colonists who will
awaken in the future, we cannot afford to lose NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0015
rows.name: Fortunately, the Ma-non have provided their ship for the evacuation of residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0016
rows.name: They possess no combat weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0017
rows.name: But even so, for NLA's sake,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0018
rows.name:
no... for the sake of us humans, they promised
to lend us their full support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0019
rows.name: If we don't step up here, then who will?

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0020
rows.name:
If any of you lose your B.B. in this battle,
I promise that a new body will be provided.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0021
rows.name: Everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0022
rows.name:
I know this is harsh, but I order you:
Protect this city, even if it means sacrificing your current bodies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0023
rows.name: I'm counting on you.[ST:wait ]
